item.Q:
Write the character: wèi

item.A:
taste
意味着 (意味著) yìwèizhe signify; mean; imply

traditional: 不測
bùcè accident; mishap; contingency

traditional: 推測
tuīcè conjecture; speculate; speculation; surmise

traditional: 水準測量
shuǐzhǔncèliáng leveling

traditional: 測力計
cèlìjì forcemeter

traditional: 測定
cèdìng to survey and evaluate

traditional: 測試
cèshì measure and test; trial; beta (software); test performance of

traditional: 測量
cèliàng survey

traditional: 測驗
cèyàn test; to test

traditional: 觀測
guāncè (scientific etc) observation; to observe

traditional: 預測
yùcè forecast; predict

traditional: 忘懷
wánghuái to forget

traditional: 情懷
qínghuái sentiment

traditional: 懷念
huáiniàn to cherish the memory of; to think of; reminisce

traditional: 懷疑
huáiyí to doubt; to suspect; doubt; suspicion

traditional: 懷疑論
huáiyílún scepticism

traditional: 滿懷
mǎnhuái to contain; full of; imbued with

traditional: 關懷
guānhuái show loving care for; show solicitude for

traditional: 歡迎
huānyíng to welcome; welcome
yínghé (vi) pander
yíngjiē to meet; to welcome; to greet
yíngmiàn directly; head-on (collision); in one's face (of wind)

traditional: 迎頭
yíngtóu to meet head-on, face-to-face, directly

traditional: 迎風
yíngfēng in the wind
jiāopèi mating; copulation
xiūpèi overhauling
fēnpèi to distribute; to assign; to allocate
fēnpèiqì allotter
zhīpèi dominate; allocate

traditional: 裝配
zhuāngpèi to assemble; to fit together

traditional: 調配
diàopèi to allocate; to deploy
tiáopèi to blend (colors, herbs); to mix
pèijiàn fittings; mountings; replacement (parts); accessories

traditional: 配備
pèibèi to allocate; to provide; to outfit with

pèihé matching; fitting in with; compatible with; to correspond; to fit; to conform to; rapport; to coordinate with; to act in concert with; to cooperate; to become man and wife; to combine parts of machine
pèizǐ gamete; sex cell

traditional: 配對
pèiduì conjugate
pèiliào ingredients (in a cooking recipe)
pèifāng prescription; formulation; completing the square (to solve quadratic equation, math)
pèisè blendent

traditional: 魔術
móshù magic
kuàimàn speed
mànxìng slow and patient; chronic (disease); slow to take effect (e.g. a slow poison)
mànmàn slowly
fàngmàn to slow
dǒngshì sensible; thoughtful; intelligent
dǒngde to understand; to know; to comprehend
yìdǒng easy to understand

traditional: 嗚嗚
wūwū (interj) boo hoo
yìjí namely; that is
yīwèi blindly; invariably
rùwèi flavorful; to be absorbed in something; interesting
kǒuwèi a person's preferences; tastes (in food); flavor
wèijīng monosodium glutamate (MSG)

wèidao flavor
wèidào flavor
huíwèi aftertast
yìwèi significance; imply (that)

traditional: 意味著
yìwèizhe signify; mean; imply

traditional: 氣味
qìwèi odor; scent

traditional: 無味
wúwèi tasteless; odorless
měiwèi delicious; relish
kǔwèi bitterness

traditional: 調味
diàowèi flavor
tiáowèi seasoning; condiment; flavoring; dressing; essences
qùwèi to interest

traditional: 風味
fēngwèi local flavor; local style
